Metadata: How do you predict success in communicating about science?

With the deluge of information coming at all of us all the time, attention is limited, distractions abound, and other interests call. This engaging two-page brochure will help you home in on the crucial, central points of your communications efforts by answering the questions "Who am I communicating with," "How is my topic of interest to them," "How will I engage my target population," "What do I hope to accomplish," and "How will I know if the communication is a success?" Includes instructions to create your own hand communications fortune teller.
